meanings.sent1: Her selectivity in choosing friends ensured she surrounded herself with trustworthy people.
meanings.sent2: The selectivity of the college admissions process made it difficult for many students to get accepted.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed selectivity in choosing which toy to play with, ignoring the rest.
meanings.sent4: His selectivity in picking out the perfect gift for his girlfriend was like finding a needle in a haystack.
meanings.sent5: The selectivity of the security system allowed only authorized personnel to enter the building.

meanings.definition: The ability to choose carefully from a variety of options.
meanings.sent1: With great selectivity, she picked out the best outfit for the party.
meanings.sent2: The chef's selectivity in ingredients resulted in a delicious and unique dish.
meanings.sent3: The selectivity of the squirrel in gathering nuts led to a stockpile for the winter.
meanings.sent4: His selectivity in choosing the right words for the speech captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The selectivity of the art collector was evident in the exquisite pieces displayed in the gallery.

meanings.definition: The process of selecting or choosing carefully.
meanings.sent1: The selectivity involved in hiring new employees ensured a strong and dedicated team.
meanings.sent2: The selectivity of the jury in the trial led to a fair and just verdict.
meanings.sent3: The selectivity of the bee in pollinating flowers helped maintain a healthy ecosystem.
meanings.sent4: Her selectivity in shopping for groceries saved her time and money.
meanings.sent5: The selectivity of the teacher in assigning homework tasks improved student learning outcomes.
